amendment.description: Amendment sought to insert provisions in the bill which allow the new Federal chemical facility regulations enacted by this bill to preempt state and local laws that "hinder, pose obstacles to, or frustrate the purpose of the federal program".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed Part B of House Report 111-327 to place provisions in the bill allowing the new Federal chemical facility regulations enacted by this bill to preempt state and local laws that "hinder, pose obstacles to, or frustrate the purpose of the federal program".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barton (TX) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 262 (Roll no. 870).
